timeline.bodyText: I was wondering if passing an int instead of a string might be easier? The int values can be easily mapped to the matching LifecycleEvent enum in Attach?
timeline.author: tiainen

replies.bodyText: So far we only listen for pause/resume lifecycle events, but there are more (start, stop, ...). Adding an int could cause issues if we later on add any of those events.
replies.author: jperedadnr

timeline.message: Use char array instead of String
Use string instead of char array
Use jstring and const char. Fix headers
